name: E. Nastya and Potions
statement:
Alchemist Nastya loves mixing potions. There are a total of n types of
potions, and one potion of type i can be bought for c_i coins.Any kind
of potions can be obtained in no more than one way, by mixing from
several others. The potions used in the mixing process will be .
Moreover, no potion can be obtained from itself through one or more
mixing processes.As an experienced alchemist, Nastya has an supply of k
types of potions p_1, p_2,
dots, p_k, but she doesn’t know which one she wants to obtain next. To
decide, she asks you to find, for each 1
le i
le n, the minimum number of coins she needs to spend to obtain a potion
of type i next.
